project_abstract.cdata: The Second Industrial Credit Project furthers the development of CIB, which provides investment loans for small- and medium-size industrial projects needing foreign exchange. The objective will be to help raise investment efficiency through import of technology and the introduction of improved project design and selection methodology.  Subborrowers will be some 60-80 state and collective enterprises primarily in coastal provinces and municipalities. Based on the experience under CIB I, the investments are expected to have high financial and economic returns. The main project risks relate to the capacity of CIB, which is a young institution, to strengthen its appraisal standards, especially  in the technical, economic and marketing areas, and to the need for continued government commitment to CIB within the process of economic reform.  However, the project provides for recruitment of additional technical and economic staff, plus training and marketing consultancy for CIB's ability to identify and evaluate projects.  Furthermore, the Government's commitment to economic reforms and to CIB remain firm.

P003420.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第二工业信贷项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将促进中国投资银行进一步发展，由其向需要外汇的中小企业提供投资贷款。项目目标是协助通过引进技术和引入先进的项目设计和选择方法提高投资效率。项目的地方贷款人为60-80家国有企业和集体企业，它们主要位于沿海省市。根据第一工业信贷项目经验，投资有望产生较高财务和经济收益。项目的主要风险同以下因素相关：（1）新组建机构中国投资银行完善其评估标准尤其是技术、经济和营销方面评估标准的能力；（2）政府在经济改革过程中继续支持中国投资银行的必要性。鉴于此，项目将资助招聘更多技术人员和经济学专业人员，提供培训和营销咨询服务，以提升中国投资银行的项目识别和评估能力。此外，中国政府仍坚定实行经济改革和支持中国投资银行。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
P003420.docty: Project Performance Assessment Report,Project Agreement,Credit Agreement,Project Agreement,Loan Agreement
